units.title: Seed AF cells in Matrigel
units.text: To investigate formation of AFOs we seeded viable AF cells in Matrigel droplets and cultured them in an ad hoc-defined generic epithelial medium without tissue-specific signals (Supplementary Table 3).
units.rationale: Establishes the initial culture conditions for generating amniotic fluid organoids.

units.title: Establish clonal AFO lines
units.text: To establish clonal lines, individual AFOs were picked, dissociated into single cells and replated (Fig. 2a,b and Extended Data Fig. 2a).
units.rationale: Creates genetically uniform organoid lines for downstream analyses.

units.title: Image organoid morphology with PC‑CT
units.text: We imaged two distinct organoid morphologies through X-ray phase-contrast computed tomography (PC-CT), confirming the applicability of the method for organoid characterization (Fig. 2e).
units.rationale: Provides high‑resolution structural validation of organoid formation.

units.title: Assess proliferation and apoptosis by immunostaining
units.text: Immunostaining confirmed cell proliferation (Ki67) and lack of apoptosis (cleaved caspase 3) within AFOs (Fig. 2f).
units.rationale: Verifies that organoids are viable and actively dividing.

units.title: Confirm epithelial identity
units.text: We confirmed the AFO’s epithelial identity by staining for pan-epithelial markers (EpCAM, ECAD and pan-cytokeratin) and showing absence of the mesenchymal marker platelet-derived growth factor receptor α (PDGFRα).
units.rationale: Ensures that derived organoids retain epithelial characteristics.

units.title: Demonstrate epithelial polarity
units.text: Notably, AFO’s epithelium is polarized as demonstrated by basolateral integrin β4 (ITGβ4), apical F-actin and zonula occludens-1 (ZO-1)-positive tight junctions (Fig. 2g).
units.rationale: Shows proper cellular organization essential for functional organoids.

units.title: Monitor SiAFO fusion and ring formation
units.text: Three hours after seeding, SiAFOs started fusing; by day 2 a more complex tubular budding structure had formed with full ring maturation at day 10.
units.rationale: Tracks the temporal development of intestinal organoid structures.

units.title: Detect proliferation with EdU incorporation
units.text: 5-ethynyl-2'-deoxyuridine (EdU) incorporation indicated cell proliferation at the SiAFO crypt base (Fig. 3a).
units.rationale: Provides a quantitative measure of cell division within organoid crypts.

units.title: Bulk RNA‑seq of kidney organoids (KAFOs)
units.text: Bulk RNA-seq of 54 KAFOs (19 AF samples; 18–34 weeks GA) showed expression of canonical development markers.
units.rationale: Profiles gene expression to confirm tissue‑specific identity of kidney organoids.

units.title: Single‑cell sequencing of AF epithelial cells
units.text: Using single-cell sequencing, we investigated human AF epithelial cells (AFEpCs), highlighting that these originate from multiple developing tissues.
units.rationale: Characterizes the heterogeneity and lineage origins of amniotic fluid epithelial cells.
